title: Sweet Potato Casserole
directions: Mix together potatoes and all remaining ingredients, except the marshmallow.
Stir in 1/2 cup of the marshmallows, and place mixture into a well greased 13 x 9 x 2 baking dish.
Bake at 250 to 300 degrees F. For 30 minutes.
Sprinkle the remaining marshmallows on top of the casserole and brown under broiler.
ingredients: 5 cups sweet potatoes, cooked and course lay mashed (buy 3-4 lbs worth of cans)
